text: Mory Konaté (born 15 November 1993) is a Guinean professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for the club Sint-Truidense. ==Professional career== Konaté began playing football late, and moved to Germany as student after his lack of footballing opportunities in Guinea. He began playing amateur football with Alfter in 2014, before signing a contract with Borussia Dortmund II in 2017. On 29 August 2019, Konaté transferred Sint-Truidense. Konaté made his professional debut with Sint-Truidense in a 5-2 Belgian First Division A win over K.A.S. Eupen on 8 February 2020, wherein he scored the opening goal. ==International career== On 13 March 2020, was called up to represent the Guinea national football team. ==References== ==External links== * * DFB Profile * FuPa Profile Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Conakry Category:Guinean footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sint-Truidense V.V. players Category:Borussia Dortmund II players Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:Regionalliga players Category:Guinean expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Belgium Category:Guinean expatriates in Germany Category:Guinean expatriates in Belgium
title: Mory Konaté
